// IMPORTANT NOTES: This template uses Smart Contacts structure. Create SITE first, then JOB, then CONTACTS

site.// INSTRUCTION: If site doesn't exist, create it first. If site exists, use its UUID in job creation
site.name: FILL_ME_IN: Site name (e.g., 'Coles Supermarket - Fortitude Valley')
site.address: FILL_ME_IN: Physical site address (where work is done)

job.company_uuid: FILL_ME_IN: Use site UUID from Step 1 (NOT ETS UUID)
job.job_address: FILL_ME_IN: Physical address where work is performed (site address)
job.job_description:
FILL_ME_IN: Format as follows:

URGENCY: [EMERGENCY/HIGH/STANDARD/LOW]
Contact during business hours to schedule job
Service window: [e.g., Monday-Friday 7am-5pm]
Response time: [e.g., Within 48 hours]

-----------------------------------

JOB DETAILS:
[Describe the work required in detail]

For any changes or variations to this work order, please contact:
Sustaine Electrical - 1300 SUSTAINE (1300 787 824)

Site access: [Who has keys/access]
Safety requirements: [PPE requirements]
job.work_done_description:
FILL_ME_IN: Billing instructions (template below)

BILLING INSTRUCTIONS:
==================
Bill To: [Corporate name and address]
PO Reference: [Same as purchase_order_number]

APPROVAL LIMIT: $[amount] + GST

Any work exceeding this amount requires prior approval from ETS.
For variations or additional work beyond approved limit:
- Contact ETS Office: 1800 ETS HELP
- Email: approvals@emergencytradeservices.com.au

Payment terms: 30 days from invoice
Invoicing: Direct to ETS head office
job.source: Created by ETS via API Integration

contacts.// INSTRUCTION: Add these contacts AFTER job creation using job UUID

site_contact.// NOTE: Type must be 'JOB' for site contacts (ServiceM8 limitation)

property_manager.// OPTIONAL CONTACT: Add if property has a manager

billing_contact.// OPTIONAL CONTACT: Add if different billing contact needed

attachment.file_content: OPTIONAL: Base64 encoded file content or file path

limitations: billing_address field ALWAYS equals job_address at job creation
Billing separation happens at invoice generation, not job creation
Site Contact must use type 'JOB' (no SITE_CONTACT type exists)
Only 3 JobContact types work: JOB, Property Manager, BILLING
Billing instructions must go in work_done_description field
Network Requests can only be sent through ServiceM8 UI, not API
workflow: 1. Check if site exists, create if needed
2. Create job with site UUID as company_uuid
3. Add job contacts (site contact is priority)
5. ServiceM8 handles billing at invoice time via Smart Contacts hierarchy
